dining.name: Indulge Food Hall
dining.descEn: Dine around the world with cuisine from India to Italy to Latin America and more. With both indoor and outdoor offerings, you can eat (and drink) at a table, bar or lounge seating, and enjoy your fill of specially curated food and cocktails.
dining.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2025/12/10/11/01/35/aca496c7-9ec5-47c7-9168-59c6a6df11cc/Norwegian Aqua Indulge Food Hall ©Norwegian Cruise Line.jpg

dining.name: Surfside Café & Grill
dining.descEn: Whatever you're craving, chances are you will find it at the Surfside Café and Grill. This complimentary buffet serves up plentiful options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Indoor and outdoor seating available.

dining.name: Le Bistro
dining.descEn: Step into something out of Versailles at Le Bistro. An exquisitely elegant atmosphere permeates as stunning floor-to-ceiling chandeliers glimmer throughout the evening. If you're looking for a posh, delectable fine-dining experience, look no further than this sophisticated French hot spot for a flav

dining.name: Los Lobos
dining.descEn: Seeking to spice up the evening? Bienvenido a Los Lobos, a premium Mexican restaurant celebrating traditional flavours with a modern twist. From Carne Asada to Tres Leches Cake with Coconut Cream, the chefs at Los Lobos focus on unique flavour combinations. Located on Ocean Boulevard with both indoo

dining.name: Onda by Scarpetta
dining.descEn: Onda, or "wave" in Italian, brings the charm and effortless elegance of its critically acclaimed sister restaurant, Scarpetta, to sea. Indulge in a modern Italian culinary experience from signature pastas to unique, mouthwatering seafood creations. And leave room for dessert.

dining.name: Commodore Room
dining.descEn: More information coming soon.

entertainment.name: Aqua Theatre & Club
entertainment.descEn: At the heart of Norwegian Aqua's electrifying entertainment is the three-story Aqua Theatre & Club. Marvel at spectacular performances then keep the party going late into the night when the theatre transforms into a high-energy dance club.Revolution: A Celebration of PrinceWith the world debut o

entertainment.name: Aqua Slidecoaster
entertainment.descEn: Get ready for the wildest ride at sea with the Aqua Slidecoaster, the world's first hybrid rollercoaster and waterslide! Reaching rip-roaring high speeds, launch into another dimension on this exclusive experience equipped with dual slides for double the thrills!

entertainment.name: Infinity Beach
entertainment.descEn: Located on either side of the ship on Ocean Boulevard, Norwegian Aqua's extended Infinity Beach boasts vast scenic views against the stunning horizon from every angle. Submerge in an infinity pool and watch the world go by in total serenity. Lounge in the sunlight on top a lush chaise bed resting ov

entertainment.name: Aqua Game Zone
entertainment.descEn: Show off your old-school skills with retro arcade games like Donkey Kong and Ms. Pac-Man. Or take your turn at state-of-the-art VR games. From photo booths to bowling and interactive activities for kids, the Aqua Game Zone is fun for everyone.
entertainment.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2025/12/05/12/58/19/3f172db4-9e27-4ce6-87d3-0fa57da68af4/NCL AQUA Aqua Game Zone ©Norwegian Cruise Line 3.jpg

entertainment.name: Glow Court
entertainment.descEn: Get an epic game going at Glow Court, a high-tech LED sports floor brilliantly engineered for immersive play. Plus, watch from the sidelines or just kick back in the stylish lounge. Then, it's time for a rematch.

entertainment.name: Bull's Eye Bar
entertainment.descEn: Discover a modern twist on a classic game. Sit back and play a round of darts with your favourite crew.
entertainment.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2025/12/10/10/34/26/9df18c9a-5973-4ce1-82c5-303277bd6a91/Norwegian Aqua Bulls Eye Bar ©Norwegian Cruise Line.jpg

entertainment.name: Belvedere Bar
entertainment.descEn: Try a crafted bottled cocktail at this contemporary bar and cocktail lounge.

entertainment.name: Luna Bar
entertainment.descEn: Want a refreshing cocktail whilst savouring epicurean delights? There's no better place to sit down for a drink than the Luna Bar. Located aft within Indulge Food Hall, you'll find an incredible mix of curated cocktails and draft beers to satisfy any taste.

entertainment.name: Metropolitan Bar
entertainment.descEn: Begin or end your evening with a sustainable craft cocktail, a biodynamic wine or a wide array of impressive classics at the exciting new Metropolitan Bar.

entertainment.name: Vibe Beach Club
entertainment.descEn: Vibe Beach Club is an exclusive, adults-only retreat with ocean views, plush loungers, an oversized hot tub, and perks like chilled towels and fruit skewers. Access requires a Pass or Cabana for two, available for your full cruise. Reserve early-space is limited.
entertainment.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2025/12/10/11/01/35/6c3e1fea-a28d-42bf-a869-a9e02741f2c1/Norwegian Aqua Vibe Beach Club ©Norwegian Cruise Line.jpg

entertainment.name: The Drop
entertainment.descEn: Let gravity take you spiraling 10-stories down the side of the ship for one truly jaw-dropping, heart-stopping, ride of your life.

entertainment.name: Main Pool
entertainment.descEn: It's time to make waves! Stretch all the way out on our expanded pool deck with a frozen drink in hand. Gaze into the horizon from two infinity hot tubs or the brand-new infinity edge pool. Or if you're taking the little ones with you, The Aqua Park is the perfect place to let them splash and play t

entertainment.name: Ocean Boulevard
entertainment.descEn: Enjoy the fresh ocean air, wide open skies and a wide range of bars, lounges and activities just steps away on the all-new and expanded Ocean Boulevard. Walk over water across Oceanwalk's glass bridge or stroll under the starry sky with your favourite cocktail in hand.

entertainment.name: Penrose Bar
entertainment.descEn: Amid the hustle and bustle of the Penrose Atrium, treat yourself to a mid-day Bloody Mary or your drink of choice. This is a morning and late-night favourite serving beer, wine, cocktails and more.

entertainment.name: Tee Time
entertainment.descEn: Go for a hole-in-one at Tee Time. Enjoy twelve interactive and high-tech holes across two decks featuring a Wonders of the World theme. It's fun for the whole family.

entertainment.name: La Terraza
entertainment.descEn: La Terazza can be found on Deck 8.

entertainment.name: Penrose Atrium
entertainment.descEn: More information coming soon.

entertainment.name: Waves Pool Bar
entertainment.descEn: Go from swimming to sipping. Grab your favourite tropical cocktail at the Waves Pool Bar and lounge the day away.

entertainment.name: Observation Lounge
entertainment.descEn: Gaze into the great wide open with a drink in hand at the contemporary and spacious Observation Lounge.

entertainment.name: Starbucks®
entertainment.descEn: Kick-start your day with a Caramel Macchiato. Grab a Teavana® Shaken Iced Green Tea Lemonade to sip whilst lounging poolside. Or recount the day’s excitement with your friends over freshly brewed coffee. Come on by Starbucks® to make your holiday even sweeter.

entertainment.name: The Haven Lounge & Bar
entertainment.descEn: This stunning bar is exclusively for guests of The Haven. Enjoy your favourite cocktail and light bites whilst surrounded by true luxury.
entertainment.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2024/07/23/09/28/33/c9b42ef6-bd3e-4e59-9952-55737a1451ac/NCL Norwegian Aqua The Haven Outdoor Lounge 1.jpeg

entertainment.name: The Haven Sundeck
entertainment.descEn: Soak up the sun and take a dip in the mesmerising infinity pool. Then let the world melt away as you relax in the sauna and cold room or enjoy a soak in the hot tub. No matter how you plan to spend your time, this private outdoor sanctuary - exclusive for Haven guests - provides the perfect escape.
entertainment.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2024/07/23/09/28/32/757f16c8-bd87-45ae-a5fa-f911692685c0/NCL Norwegian Aqua The Haven Sun Deck.jpeg

entertainment.name: Syd Normans
entertainment.descEn: Sing along to your favourite hits as you sip on speciality cocktails at Syd Norman's Pour House. The interactive experience and rollicking house band will take you back to rock's glory days.

entertainment.name: Humidor Cigar Lounge
entertainment.descEn: Appreciate a good cigar and a great drink in just the right setting.
entertainment.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2025/12/10/11/01/35/6bfcf43e-5cef-4707-b8dc-38669607137e/Norwegian Aqua Humidor Cigar Lounge ©Norwegian Cruise Line.jpg

entertainment.name: NCL Super Selfie
entertainment.descEn: You are the FIRST to AQUA and you have bragging rights. The all new NCL Super Selfie will capture your photo, on top of AQUA, whilst at sea!

entertainment.name: Levity Comedy
entertainment.descEn: Tickle your funny bone with sidesplitting stand-up routines. Featuring a science of comedy theme, Levity Comedy has the perfect formula to get you laughing all night long.

entertainment.name: Soleil Bar
entertainment.descEn: Want a refreshing cocktail whilst taking in the outside? There's no better place to sit down for a drink than the Soleil Bar. Located at the aft end of Indulge Outdoor Lounge on Ocean Boulevard, our expansive oceanfront promenade, you'll find an incredible mix of cocktails and draft beers alongside

entertainment.name: Casino
entertainment.descEn: Spin your way to the jackpot playing the most popular slots including reel and video slots. Or pull up a chair at your favourite table game, from blackjack to craps and more. Whatever games you choose, you can bet on a good time in our award-winning casino.

entertainment.name: i-Connect Internet Café
entertainment.descEn: Our iCafe help desk offers you the comfort and convenience of staying in touch via the Internet whilst you are Freestyle Cruising®. Please refer to Manager Hours posted in the Freestyle Daily.

entertainment.name: Onboard Shopping
entertainment.descEn: The Collection: Immerse yourself in the allure of luxury as you peruse our curated collection of pre-loved handbags featuring iconic brands such as Gucci, Prada, Fendi, Louis Vuitton, and many more. Elevate your onboard shopping experience and discover the epitome of opulence at The Collection - Sus

entertainment.name: Professional Portraits
entertainment.descEn: Take advantage of this time together whilst onboard to create beautiful photographs that will last a lifetime. entertainment.name: Perspectives Studio
entertainment.descEn: At Perspectives Photography Studio, we celebrate love, life and human connection creating spectacular portraits that will be handed down for generations. Your onboard Portrait Artist(s) will capture your unique spirit in our private studio or on location, it's your choice. Visit us to learn more abo

health.name: Mandara Spa and Salon
health.descEn: Step into the world-renowned Mandara Spa and Salon®, where time slows and tranquility takes over. Indulge in signature massages, high-performance Biotec facials, and ancient healing through acupuncture-or rejuvenate your skin with advanced Med Spa treatments. Complete your transformation in the salo

health.descEn: You won't want to leave the gym, seriously. At the Pulse Fitness Centre, you can get your heart racing with the sunrise and do yoga beside the sunset, thanks to our 270-degree views of the ocean. Gaze at the horizon as you feel your blood flow - whether you're lifting weights, taking a class, or sim

health.descEn: Marvel at our two-story waterfall and take a holistic approach to wellness in our Thermal Suite. kids.name: Kids Aqua Park
kids.descEn: Your kids are in for some serious water play. With multiple cascading water features and splashtacular experiences, the Kids' Aqua Park will be their favourite spot.

kids.descEn: Guppies Open Play is for the littlest cruisers and offers a play space for parents to interact with their infants/babies/toddlers 6 months - 3 years old and children in nappies. Toys, balls, and sensory items are available within the space. The timetable varies per ship and itinerary and is posted i

kids.name: Splash Academy
kids.descEn: Your kids will have a blast inside Splash Academy where they can enjoy creative play, sports and more.
kids.image: https://assets.widgety.co.uk/2025/12/09/13/30/43/b2b85e3a-adfa-403c-84fb-a5b188d40423/NCL Norwegian Aqua Splash Academy ©Norwegian Cruise Line.jpg

kids.name: Entourage
kids.descEn: It is time to change the way you play. Entourage for 13-17 year olds offers modern, digital, and inclusive options to engage the way you want. Connect. Influence. Create. Be You.

kids.name: Group Babysitting
kids.descEn: Drop off the kids and have a romantic night out. Available in the evenings, our Group Sitting is supervised by our certified youth staff. Fees apply for this service and are charged directly to the parents' onboard account.

title: MSC World Asia
teaserEn: Discover The Art of Cruising on board MSC World Asia, the new World Class ship from MSC Cruises.
introductionEn: Discover The Art of Cruising on board MSC World Asia, the new World Class ship from MSC Cruises.MSC World Asia showcases MSC Cruises' unparalleled expertise in The Art of Cruising, blending refined craftsmanship with meticulous attention to detail.This harmonious combination delivers the art of savouring, exploring and making memories.
diningIntroEn: MSC World Asia offers unexpected, interactive experiences. The art of elevating ingredients crafts dining experiences to meet global tastes for all guests and travellers including 6 speciality restaurants. Guests also have the opportunity to discover 2 ample restaurant buffets on board, each offering a distinct ambience, open 24/7, and the 5 main dining restaurants.
entertainmentIntroEn: A world of onboard fun awaitsGuests of all ages will be able to enjoy awe-inspiring entertainment from morning to night, including three new concert-style shows in the multipurpose Luna Park Arena; five new full-scale theatre productions in the World Theatre; four themed experiences in the Panorama Lounge; and surprise, pop-up live exhibits throughout the ship. And as always, the award-winning MSC family offering features state-of-the-art facilities for kids with a dedicated area of the ship as well as a range of kids’ clubs and tailor-made programmes designed for each age group.
healthIntroEn: An MSC Cruise is not just a chance to travel and explore – it’s also a chance to relax, feel healthy, and look your best. Unwind with a soothing sauna, relax with a traditional Balinese massage, or treat yourself to a high-tech beauty treatment during your cruise in our MSC Aurea Spa.Wellness and activityEnjoy state-of-the-art sports facilities, including a Technogym® equipped gym with stunning ocean views. Stay active with a power walking track, or challenge friends on the minigolf course. Engage in various sports like basketball, tennis, volleyball, five-a-side football, and squash, all while soaking in breathtaking views.
kidsIntroEn: Every MSC Cruise is full of fun and discovery for kids of every age, starting with all the activities organised just for them and included in your fare. With a packed program of sports, games, competitions, parties and more, your children will enjoy endless discoveries with their new friends.Children can discover a world of their own thanks to 5 dedicated clubs for ages ranging from 0 to 17 years old, where they are looked after by our trained, multilingual personnel, certified for safeguarding children.Each club offers a range of activities designed specifically for the relevant age group, ensuring everyone will be happy, from toddlers to teenagers. The clubs are open every day, so you can schedule your family time around your preferences.

title: MSC World Atlantic
teaserEn: Where worlds meetIntroducing MSC World Atlantic, where European style meets American comfort like you've never seen before. Just as the Atlantic connects continents, this ship bridges cultures, flavours, and generations. Go on a global taste tour from authentic Italian cuisine to a sizzling American steakhouse. Discover spaces where timeless design meets vibrant energy, then dive into sky-high thrills that fill your camera roll. This isn’t just a cruise. It’s your chance to see, taste, and feel the world in one unforgettable holiday.
introductionEn: Where worlds meetIntroducing MSC World Atlantic, where European style meets American comfort like you've never seen before. Just as the Atlantic connects continents, this ship bridges cultures, flavours, and generations. Go on a global taste tour from authentic Italian cuisine to a sizzling American steakhouse. Discover spaces where timeless design meets vibrant energy, then dive into sky-high thrills that fill your camera roll. This isn’t just a cruise. It’s your chance to see, taste, and feel the world in one unforgettable holiday.
diningIntroEn: With more than 20 dining experience, including two ample buffet restaurants, 6 speciality restaurants, and 5 elegant main dining rooms, MSC World Atlantic invites you to savour a world of flavors. And for something quick yet delicious, our Grab & Go options offer tempting bites that will satisfy your cravings any time of day.
entertainmentIntroEn: A world of onboard fun awaitsGuests of all ages will be able to enjoy awe-inspiring entertainment from morning to night, including three new concert-style shows in the multipurpose Luna Park Arena; five new full-scale theatre productions in the World Theatre; four themed experiences in the Panorama Lounge; and surprise, pop-up live exhibits throughout the ship. And as always, the award-winning MSC family offering features state-of-the-art facilities for kids with a dedicated area of the ship as well as a range of kids’ clubs and tailor-made programmes designed for each age group.
healthIntroEn: An MSC Cruise is not just a chance to travel and explore – it’s also a chance to relax, feel healthy, and look your best. Unwind with a soothing sauna, relax with a traditional Balinese massage, or treat yourself to a high-tech beauty treatment during your cruise in our MSC Aurea Spa.Wellness and activityEnjoy state-of-the-art sports facilities, including a Technogym® equipped gym with stunning ocean views. Stay active with a power walking track, or challenge friends on the minigolf course. Engage in various sports like basketball, tennis, volleyball, five-a-side football, and squash, all while soaking in breathtaking views.
kidsIntroEn: Every MSC Cruise is full of fun and discovery for kids of every age, starting with all the activities organised just for them and included in your fare. With a packed program of sports, games, competitions, parties and more, your children will enjoy endless discoveries with their new friends.Children can discover a world of their own thanks to 5 dedicated clubs for ages ranging from 0 to 17 years old, where they are looked after by our trained, multilingual personnel, certified for safeguarding children.Each club offers a range of activities designed specifically for the relevant age group, ensuring everyone will be happy, from toddlers to teenagers. The clubs are open every day, so you can schedule your family time around your preferences.

title: Norwegian Aura
teaserEn: Out here, the Memories Make Themselves.Introducing Norwegian Aura™ - our newest and biggest ship ever. Designed to draw you closer to the sea - with open-air spaces that flow effortlessly from thrill to relaxation in one seamless escape, day to night.
introductionEn: Out here, the Memories Make Themselves.Introducing Norwegian Aura™ - our newest and biggest ship ever. Designed to draw you closer to the sea - with open-air spaces that flow effortlessly from thrill to relaxation in one seamless escape, day to night. The multi-level Ocean Heights™ is a sweeping open-air complex that moves with your mood, whether that means racing your kids down a dueling waterslide, conquering your fears on the ropes course or simply relaxing in the seaside cabanas. Out here, you'll experience the moments that truly matter with the ones you love most. Reserve your place on Norwegian Aura, setting sail in 2027.
entertainmentIntroEn: Welcome to our largest ship ever - offering exciting activities perfect for the whole family! Indulge in more outdoor space, new & unique experiences, expanded favorites and waterslides at every turn!

entertainment.descEn: Vibe Beach Club is an exclusive, adults-only retreat with ocean views, plush loungers, an oversized hot tub, and perks like chilled towels and fruit skewers. Access requires a Pass or Cabana for two, available for your full cruise. Reserve early-space is limited.

entertainment.descEn: Located on either side of the ship on Ocean Boulevard, Norwegian Aura's extended Infinity Beach boasts vast scenic views against the stunning horizon from every angle. No matter how you plan to spend your time, this private outdoor sanctuary - exclusive for Haven guests - provides the perfect escape.
